name: keystone-static-blog
description: Starter template to statically generate blogs with Keystone and Next.js
author: Dinesh Pandiyan <flexdinesh@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "SERVER,APP" -c "magenta.bold,green.bold" "cd keystone-server && yarn dev" "cd next-app && yarn dev"
scripts.start:keystone: cd keystone-server && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.export:app: cd next-app && yarn clean && yarn export
scripts.x: concurrently -s first "yarn start:keystone" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && yarn kill:server"
scripts.export: concurrently --names "KEYSTONE,NEXT-BUILD" --success "last" "yarn start:keystone"  "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && yarn export:app && yarn kill:server"
scripts.push: git add. && git commit -m 'New build ðŸš€' && git push origin head
